## Start Monitoring Services with Docker Compose

```bash
docker-compose up
```

## Automated Running of Selected Examples as Tests

```python
- automation of running selected examples as a test
```

## Run Evidently Metrics Calculation Script

```python
python evidently_metrics_calculation.py
```

## Grafana Integration Example for Evidently TestSuite

```python
# Example: Airflow integration with Evidently TestSuite

```

## Stop Monitoring Services with Docker Compose

```bash
docker-compose down
```

## Upload Demo Project to Evidently UI

```python
python remote_demo_project.py
```

## Install Evidently Python Package

```bash
pip install evidently
```

## Run Evidently UI Service using Docker

```bash
bash run_service.sh
```

## Run Evidently UI Service Locally

```bash
evidently ui
```

## Launch Evidently UI with Demo Projects (Shell)

```shell
uv run --with evidently evidently ui --demo-projects all
```
